appetizer.name: Bread
appetizer.description: The bread is free, what more could you ask for?

appetizer.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizer.description: Breaded cheese fried to perfection, 12 sticks included

appetizer.name: Steak Bites
appetizer.description: Johnny told you he has the best steak around, but if you don't believe him try this first. A 4 oz. filet mignon diced up for y'all to share, this'll prove Johnny right

salad.name: Greek Salad
salad.description: Hand-tossed salad with a light greek dressing, a perfect choice for the healthy minded folks

salad.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
salad.description: Hand-tossed salad with your choice of salad dressing and grilled chicken on top

steak.name: Filet Mignon 4 oz/8 oz
steak.description: This filet is the most mouth-watering thing you will ever eat, Johnny guarantees it

steak.name: NY Strip 10 oz
steak.description: The strip is known for having the perfect balance of fat and flavor. A good sized steak for people who want to keep their pants buttoned

steak.name: Sirloin 6 oz/12 oz
steak.description: Sirloin perfectly marbled to maximize flavor and cooked to perfection

steak.name: T-Bone 16 oz/22 oz
steak.description: This massive bone-in steak is a favorite among beef enthusiasts, a large steak with a lean side and a fatty side, providing lots of flavor in one package

steak.name: Johnny's Special
steak.description: An 8 oz filet wrapped in bacon AND a 16 oz T-Bone, you will not be able to button up after this

chicken.name: Grilled Chicken Dinner
chicken.description: A plump and juicy chicken grilled chicken breast, served with 2 sides

chicken.name: Chicken Sandwich Dinner
chicken.description: Fried or grilled chicken served up on a jumbo bun with a pickle spear and 1 side

chicken.name: Chicken Tender Plate
chicken.description: 4 breaded & fried tenders, served with 1 side

burger.name: Standard All-American
burger.description: A 1/2 lb patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles

burger.name: Spicy Burger
burger.description: A 1/2 lb patty with homemade spicy mayonaise, pickles, fried jalapenos, and a carolina reaper made into the patty. Not for the weak-hearted or anybody who wants solid bowel movements later

burger.name: Bubba's Creation
burger.description: This thing is a monster yall, Bubba likes his burgers on texas toast he also stacks 3 of them together with bacon and cheese. 3 1/2 lb patties sandwiched between texas toast with bacon and cheese on every layer. Only for those who want a challenge. Served with 2 sides

seafood.name: Fried Catfish
seafood.description: Local catfish caught and brought to us to batter and fry up just for you

seafood.name: Grilled Snapper
seafood.description: A non-fishy tasting fish that comes grilled or blackened

seafood.name: Grilled Shrimp 6 ct/12 ct
seafood.description: Grilled or blackened shrimp on skewers just for you, served on a bed of grilled & seasoned vegetables

dessert.name: Momma's Homemade Apple Pie
dessert.description: Momma's award winning apple pie sold by the slice or as a whole pie

dessert.name: Big Bertha's death by chocolate
dessert.description: Bertha loves chocolate and she's willing to share her favorite creation with you. A chocolate lava cake, with chocolate icing, a dark chocolate ganache between each layer, topped with whipped cream

dessert.name: Skillet Cookie
dessert.description: A giant cookie served fresh in an iron skillet topped with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate syrup, perfect dessert for 2-4 people
